TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ObjectDataSourceEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供資料給 控制項的 和 事件。

span.span: Provides data for the and events of the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 類別用於並方法，以提供存取權之前使用的任何資料作業的商務物件執行個體控制項和商務物件會執行。The class is used in the and methods to provide access to the business object instance before any data operations that are using the control and business object are performed. 設定商務物件，並使用存取屬性。The business object is set and accessed using the property. 藉由新增事件處理常式委派以處理事件，您可以在自訂程式碼，而不是建立商務物件的執行個體執行具現化。By adding an event handler delegate to handle the event, you can create an instance of the business object in custom code instead of the performing the instantiation. 當您想您的商務物件或呼叫來建立執行個體的非預設建構函式的非預設執行個體時，這是很有用一律會呼叫預設建構函式來建立它所使用的商務物件的執行個體。This is useful when you want a non-default instance of your business object or to call a non-default constructor to create the instance; the always calls the default constructor to create an instance of the business object it works with. 您也可以加入事件處理常式委派以處理事件，可讓您可公開存取任何公開的成員執行任何額外的初始化或工作的商務物件。You can also add an event handler delegate to handle the event, which enables you to access any publicly exposed members of the business object to perform any additional initialization or work. 並不會呼叫方法控制項，是否執行資料作業的商務物件方法`static`。The and methods are not called by the control, if the business object method that performs the data operations is `static`. 控制項會公開許多您可以使用基礎的商務物件在其生命週期中的不同時間處理的事件。The control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying business object at various times in its lifecycle. 下表列出的事件，以及相關聯類別和事件處理常式委派。The following table lists the events and the associated classes and event handler delegates. |Event - 事件Event|EventArgsEventArgs|事件處理常式EventHandler| |-----------|---------------|------------------| |。.

只有在建立商務物件的執行個體之前立即發生。Occurs immediately before the instance of the business object is created.||| |。.

建立商務物件的執行個體之後立即發生。Occurs immediately after the instance of the business object is created.||| |。.

在擷取資料之前發生。Occurs before the data is retrieved.||| |、 和 。, , and .

執行插入、 更新或刪除作業之前發生。Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.||| |。.

在擷取資料之後，就會發生。Occurs after the data is retrieved.||| |, , ., , .

插入、 更新或刪除作業完成之後，就會發生。Occur after the insert, update, or delete operation is completed.||| |。.

在商務物件被終結之前發生。Occurs before a business object is destroyed.||| ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項使用商務物件和擷取及顯示資訊的控制項。The first code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to retrieve and display information. 第二個程式碼範例提供第一個程式碼範例使用的範例基本的商務物件。The second code example provides the example basic business object that the first code example uses. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項使用商務物件和擷取及顯示資訊的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to retrieve and display information. 在此範例中，如同許多真實世界案例中，它可能不可能也不適合使用的商務物件的預設執行個體控制項。In this example, as in many real-world scenarios, it might not be possible nor appropriate to use a default instance of the business object with the control. 在此範例中，成功無法呼叫預設建構函式，因為它將會擲回例外狀況。In this example, the cannot successfully call the default constructor because it will throw an exception. 在某些情況下，可能會受保護的預設建構函式，並在其他它可能會初始化為所需狀態的商務物件。In some cases, the default constructor might be protected and in others it might not initialize the business object to a desired state. 因為任何原因，您可以自行建立商務物件的執行個體並將設定執行個體屬性傳遞至處理常式的物件。Whatever the reason, you can create an instance of the business object yourself and set the instance to the property of the object that is passed to the handler. 這是商務物件的執行個體將用來執行其工作。This is the business object instance that the will use to perform its work. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15/CS/objds15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15/VB/objds15vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範上述的程式碼範例會使用範例基本的商務物件。The following code example demonstrates the example basic business object that the preceding code example uses. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15/CS/northwindemployee15.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15/VB/northwindemployee15.vb#2)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified object.

span.span: The business object the uses to perform data operations; otherwise, , if is passed to the .

remarks.format: ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項使用商務物件和擷取及顯示資訊的控制項。The first code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to retrieve and display information. 第二個程式碼範例提供第一個程式碼範例使用的範例基本的商務物件。The second code example provides the example basic business object that the first code example uses. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項使用商務物件和擷取及顯示資訊的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to retrieve and display information. 在此範例中，如同許多真實世界案例中，它可能不可能也不適合使用的商務物件的預設執行個體控制項。In this example, as in many real-world scenarios, it might not be possible nor appropriate to use a default instance of the business object with the control. 在此範例中，成功無法呼叫預設建構函式，因為它將會擲回例外狀況。In this example, the cannot successfully call the default constructor because it will throw an exception. 在某些情況下，可能會受保護的預設建構函式，並在其他它可能會初始化為所需狀態的商務物件。In some cases, the default constructor might be protected and in others it might not initialize the business object to a desired state. 因為任何原因，您可以自行建立商務物件的執行個體並將設定執行個體屬性傳遞至處理常式的物件。Whatever the reason, you can create an instance of the business object yourself and set the instance to the property of the object that is passed to the handler. 這是商務物件的執行個體將用來執行其工作。This is the business object instance that the will use to perform its work. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15/CS/objds15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15/VB/objds15vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範上述的程式碼範例會使用範例基本的商務物件。The following code example demonstrates the example basic business object that the preceding code example uses.
